title: League Displays Setup
body:
So I saw the league displays thing and saw it sounds nice. But I'll cut the bullshit. When I started to setup, and install, it displayed:
Output folder: C:\Riot Games\LeagueDisplays\browser
Extract: BsSndRpt.exe... 100%
Extract: BugSplat.dll... 100%
Extract: BugSplatRC.dll... 100%
Can't write: C:\Riot Games\LeagueDisplays\browser\LeagueDisplays.exe
Anyone got ideas? So far I haven't seen any other posts relating to mine.

replies.body:
HO boy, that's a confusing bunch of errors. x_x

Unfortunately those aren't ones that I recognize, but I can imagine that this has something to do with the installation being blocked. You might want to _temporarily _ disable your firewall or run the installer as admin in order to make sure you don't get blocked by permissions. Le me know if this error still pops up after that!
